error.post_too_large: The post contents are too large.
error.message_not_found: The specified message could not be found.
error.post_not_found: The corresponding post was not found.
error.deletion_not_permitted: The deletion of the corresponding post is not permitted.
error.posting_suspended: The posting function of this bulletin board is currently suspended.
error.admin_only: Only administrators are allowed to post to the bulletin board.
error.invalid_referer:
Posts cannot be made from any URLs besides
{url}.
error.too_many_characters: The are too many characters in the post contents.
error.too_many_linebreaks: There are too many line breaks in the post contents.
error.file_size_too_large: The overall file size of the post contents is too large.
error.name_too_long: There are too many characters in the name field. (Up to {max} characters)
error.email_too_long: There are too many characters in the email field. (Up to {max} characters)
error.title_too_long: There are too many characters in the title field. (Up to {max} characters)
error.post_interval_too_short: The time between posts is too short. Please try again.
error.log_size_limit: Message log file exceeds the file size limit
